channel.title: An auto fighter plus item collector and bank, monk healer and arrow collector
channel.description:
basically the title says it all, i have no idea how to code anything at the moment, altho hopefully i will learn soon.
i was thinking of this for a pure, but it could work for all.
a good spot to train pures is the monks, because they dont hit very high, they heal themselves during combat, and they can heal u if u talk 2 them. they are west of edgeville in the monestary if ur looking for them
another idea is an autofigher that collects cow hides and banks, and u can set it so that if you havent done price ali quest you can walk around, then you can bank the hides.
the arrow collector is simple, just after fighting pick up the arrows...atleast it sounds simple
it would b great if these had anti-ban and detect randoms
thanks for looking

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The one problem would be the monks are always full.
